Uses of Class
com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.utils.Patterns.ActionMatcher

  • Packages that use Patterns.ActionMatcher 
    Package Description
    com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.utils  

    • Uses of Patterns.ActionMatcher in com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.utils

      Methods in com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.utils that return Patterns.ActionMatcher 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Patterns.ActionMatcher<G> Patterns.ActionMatcher.allowMultiple()
      Allows multiple actions to be performed it multiple when clauses match, otherwise only the first (matches in order)
      Patterns.ActionMatcher<G> Patterns.IntermediateMatcher.andAct()
      Sets up a match-then-act clause
      <P> Patterns.ActionMatcher<G> Patterns.ActionMatcher.when(Class<P> clazz, Consumer<P> expression)
      Performs action specified by expression if matching variable is of the specified class
      <P> Patterns.ActionMatcher<G> Patterns.ActionMatcher.when(Class<P> clazz, Predicate<P> predicate, Consumer<P> expression)
      Performs action specified by expression if matching variable is of the specified class *and* the specified predicate is true
      <P> Patterns.ActionMatcher<G> Patterns.ActionMatcher.when(Class<P> clazz, Runnable expression)
      Performs action specified by expression if matching variable is of the specified class
      <P> Patterns.ActionMatcher<G> Patterns.ActionMatcher.when(Class<P> clazz, Supplier<Boolean> predicate, Runnable expression)
      Performs action specified by expression if matching variable is of the specified class *and* the specified predicate is true
      Patterns.ActionMatcher<G> Patterns.ActionMatcher.when(Predicate<G> predicate, Consumer<G> expression)
      Performs action specified by expression if the predicate resolves to true
      Patterns.ActionMatcher<G> Patterns.ActionMatcher.when(Supplier<Boolean> predicate, Runnable expression)
      Performs action specified by expression if the predicate resolves to true
